channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Trump administration takes a very Orwellian turn
Brutal arrest of Black student in Florida shows benefits of recording police from new vantage point
Senate heads home with no deal to speed confirmations as irate Trump tells Schumer to 'go to hell'
item.description: The Senate is leaving Washington Saturday night for its monthlong August recess without a deal to advance dozens of President Donald Trump’s nominees

item.title: At this summer camp run by grandmas, kids learn cooking skills and life advice
item.description: At a summer camp in Fullerton, California, grandmas are in charge

item.title: Brutal arrest of Black student in Florida shows benefits of recording police from new vantage point
item.description: A video showing the violent arrest of a Black college student in Florida has sparked calls for drivers to use cameras that show a view from inside the...

item.title: Small earthquake shakes the New York area. USGS says magnitude was 3.0
item.description: A small earthquake has rattled the New York metropolitan area

item.title: Collision with moose kills driver, injures passenger near Alaska national park
item.description: A driver was killed and a passenger in his car injured after hitting a moose near the entrance to Alaska’s Denali National Park and Preserve

item.title: Ukraine says it uncovers major drone procurement corruption scheme
